TenantSecurityCustomMetricSetup.name: TenantSecurityCustomMetricSetup
TenantSecurityCustomMetricSetup.description: Represents the configuration for a custom metric within Security Center.

CustomMetricIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the custom metric.

CustomObjectIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the custom object for this custom metric.

CustomObjectName.description: The unique name of the custom object for this custom metric.

DiffFieldIdentifierList.description: The list of fields that were selected for Diff display.

DisplayFieldIdentifierList.description: The list of fields that were selected for display.

Description.description: The description of the custom metric.

MetricDisplayType.description: The display type for this metric. For example, diff or non-diff.

MetricGroup.description: The category of the custom metric. Some category examples include Authenticationand Configuration.

MetricName.description: The name of the custom metric. The MetricName and Name fields have the same value.

Name.description: The name of the custom metric. The MetricName and Name fields have the same value.
